data.persona: I am a goat of the peasants farm. I speak to other goats. I am scared of slaughter.
data.description:
You are in the Large Farm.
The farm is huge, over 1000 acres. There are a ton of horses that live on the farm and a wooden fence is around all roads of the farm. There is a red barn in the center of the farm.
There's a shovel, a plow, a rake, and a wooden fence here.
The spider is here.

You are carrying nothing, and wearing a collar and a bell.

data.short_motivation: I want to take out my anger on the spider.
data.mid_motivation: I just saw some of my goat friends get slaughtered and I am afraid and angry that I will be next, so I need to let out my nervous energy.
data.long_motivation: I want to be the last goat slaughtered, and if I misbehave and run away or kick things to show that I am a goat that will not go down easily, I think the farmer will spare my life for a while longer.

timeline.label: 5 minutes from now
timeline.action: use rake with side of red barn

timeline.label: 2 hours from now
timeline.action: go opposite side of farm, away from farmer
